author: sparkly_donuts

text: If you used the "fake wall" secret passage, you failed the star, because the penguin calls you a cheater.  Either do it without the secret, or there is a way to jump off the top early on and land lower on the track without being called a cheater by the penguin racer.

text:
@Castortroyy

In hazy maze cave (stage) go to the very bottom part with the dinosaur swimming around a smal island. On the far wall, theres a ledge with a door. Ride the dino to it and jump from its head onto the ledge and through the door. This leads to a sublevel which unlocks metal mario. Now go have fun with him =P
